Detailed Description

This class represents a TinyJava FOR statement.

The syntax of the for statement is either

  • FOR '(' IDENT '=' initExpression ';' termExpression ';' updateExpression ')' statement

or

  • FOR '(' IDENT '[' indexExpression ']' '=' initExpression ';' termExpression ';' updateExpression ')' statement

A for statement is represented by:

  • identifier on the left-hand side of the initialization expression
  • an index Expression, if the left hand side is an array element
  • an initialization Expression
  • a termination Expression
  • an update Expression, and
  • a for statement body, that is another Statement. A symbol table ENTRY pointer may be provided, as well.

ENTRY should be defined as a macro, and its value should be a class, which is the root of the symbol table entry hierarchy. Its default value is Entry. The macro should be defined at the beginning of the header file Ast.h.

const char *  n,
Expression *  i,
Expression *  t,
Expression *  u,
Statement *  b 
)

Create a new ForStatement object.

Parameters:
lno a source code line number with the for statement (should be the beginning of the for statement)
n a string representing the name on the left-hand side of the initialization expression
i a pointer to an Expression representing the initialization expression
t a pointer to an Expression representing the termination expression
u a pointer to an Expression representing the update expression
b a pointer to a Statement representing the for statement body
Exceptions:
AstException if either the n, i, t, u, or b argument is NULL

Parameters:

x a pointer to an Expression representing the index (subscript) expression, if the left hand side is an array elemnt
i a pointer to an Expression representing the initialization expression
t a pointer to an Expression representing the termination expression
u a pointer to an Expression representing the update expression
b a pointer to a Statement representing the for statement body
Exceptions:
AstException if either the n, x, i, t, u, or b argument is NULL
